excerpt.rendered: Bee pollen granules are all natural with absolutely no additives – all of its enzymes are kept intact, providing you with a rich source of vitamins, especially b12 and e, minerals, and amino acids. It has a mildly sweet and floral taste that you can add to smoothies, cereals, yogurts, or any of your favorite everyday foods.
